
{{alias}}( x )
    Converts a double-precision floating-point number to the nearest single-
    precision floating-point number.

    This function may be used as a polyfill for the (poorly named) ES2015
    built-in `Math.fround`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Double-precision floating-point number.

    Returns
    -------
    out: float
        Nearest single-precision floating-point number.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 1.337 )
    1.3370000123977661

    See Also
    --------
